Greeting.Name: JIMUK CHOI
Greeting.Slogan: Creativity, Skill, and Communication in Every Design

WhoIam.Title: Who I am
WhoIam.MainText: I am a Product Designer focused on UX/UI planning and strategy
WhoIam.SubText: I simplify complex systems in industries such as shipping, port logistics, and sales solutions into clear, intuitive experiences, taking ownership from planning and design to project scheduling. With a background in design and front-end publishing, I create feasible, developer-friendly designs, and my strength lies in meticulous coordination and collaboration that enhance the quality and success of projects.

List.title: Web Design
List.content: Transforming ideas into stunning, user-friendly websites that captivate and engage. My expertise in web design ensures that every project not only looks exceptional but also performs seamlessly across all devices.

List.title: App Design
List.content: Crafting intuitive and visually appealing app interfaces that delight users and enhance their experience. My app design approach focuses on creating seamless interactions and innovative solutions.

List.title: Design Systems
List.content: Developing comprehensive design systems that streamline design and development processes. My approach ensures consistency and efficiency, empowering teams to build cohesive and scalable solutions.

List.title: Webflow
List.content: Harnessing the power of Webflow to create dynamic, responsive websites with ease. My skills in Webflow enable me to deliver visually stunning websites that are both functional and flexible.

List.title: Branding
List.content: Designing compelling brand identities that resonate and leave a lasting impression. My branding expertise helps businesses articulate their unique value and connect with their audience effectively.
